Class DnaSequenceFastq

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<SequenceFasta>
public class DnaSequenceFastq
extends DnaSequenceFasta

An object of DnaSequenceFastq is a dna sequence file in FASTQ format

Since:
2013

trim

public void trim(int cutoff,
                 float maxPer,
                 int minLen)
Trim and filter the sequence according to quality score

Parameters:
cutoff - the minimum quality score. Quality score=13 is corresponding to error rate= 5%.
maxPer - the maximum bases below cutoff
minLen - the minimum len after trimming. If length after trimming < minLen, set length to zero.
